about_the_game:
David's wife, Alla, decides to hire a girl to help with household chores. To make it more cost-effective, she also opts to hire an au pair. How this decision will affect them is something we're about to discover.

Tasha made a new style before traveling to US. 

Step into the shoes of David, a local businessman, or Alex, his son, as you navigate the ebbs and flows of family dynamics, business operations, and personal relationships. Watch as David and Alex each try to impress Tasha, a new arrival au-pair in their family who tries to find her own journey. All under the watchful eye of Alla, who commands her own space in this lovely family.

In Innocent Au-pair, your choices matter and will lead to different outcomes. By focusing on and helping David, the game will provide more story development centered around him. Alternatively, if you choose to prioritize Alex, the game will dynamically shift to focus on his storyline.

 

Check out:

  • 10+ hours of engaging gameplay,

  • Over 3000 HD-quality renders,

  • Experience 50 + captivating and steamy animations,

  • Immerse yourself in a story with over 50,000 words of script.

content_descriptors.notes:
Innocent Au-pair is intended for adults only and includes explicit sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters, story, and actions are entirely fictitious, and all characters are depicted as 18 years or older.

Contains: Nudity, consensual and non-consensual sexual content, alternative relationships, use of alcohol and drugs, graphic depictions of oral, vaginal, and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids, and themes of manipulation.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.15 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Innocent Au-pair

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
